metadata.title: CVE-2024-46729 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix incorrect size calculation for loop[WHY]fe_clk_en has size of 5 but sizeof(fe_clk_en) has byte size 20 which islager than the array size.[HOW]Divide byte size 20 by its element size.This fixes 2 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
